Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People across social media have expressed their concerns regarding the upcoming Federal Budget calling on the Albanese Government to act on recommendations made by the Economic Inclusion Committee. Many are urging the government to increase JobSeeker and related payments citing the current rate of $50 a day as inadequate. Others are asking for investments in gender equality and support for the disadvantaged. The government has responded positively to discussions but its decisions are being closely watched to see how it will allocate funds in this tight fiscal environment.
